goldengate1.description:
How cool is Golden Gate Park? Not only does it have a remote control boat pond, there's a grand old stone building next to it that houses the Model Yacht Club.

Nana and Felix check out the action.
goldengate1.title: Goldengate 1

goldengate2.description: Who said model boating was dull? This friendly five year old boat captain was as surprised as us when his father's superfast super expensive speedboat accidentally rammed his craft. The father's boat capsized and started to sink.  Both Felix and the young captain were in stitches at the sight of the dad shedding watches, cell phones, cameras and PDAs from all pockets as he waded in to retrieve his vessel.
goldengate2.title: Goldengate 2

goldengate3.description: Golden Gate park has a scrofulous herd of buffalo. We're talking scabies.
goldengate3.title: Goldengate 3

patch01.description: 'Twas the weekend before All Hallows' Eve.  We roused ourselves pumpkin patchwards.
patch01.title: Patch 1

patch03.description: The kids were insistent on getting small ones for pretty much every stuffed animal in the house.
patch03.title: Patch 3

patch04.description: Nothing says harvest time like a stack of hay bales.
patch04.title: Patch 4

patch05.description: Another harvest tradition: corn mazes!  You wander through them...
patch05.title: Patch 5

patch06.description: ... for hours. We got to the ¼ way point in 20 minutes.  We took the wimp exit they were considerate enough to put there.
patch06.title: Patch 6

patch07.description: This is what the field looks like from the air.
patch07.title: Patch 7

patch08.description: Another harvest tradition: a hay ride!
patch08.title: Patch 8

patch09.description: This all took place on an organic farm in Fremont. They gave us lettuce.
patch09.title: Patch 9

patch10.description: Felix knows exactly what to do with leafy greeny veggies: anywhere but the mouth!
patch10.title: Patch 10

treed.description: It's been a long time since Dean had to retrieve a soccer ball from a tree. (It was his doing, not the boys.)
treed.title: Treed

description:
Preschool social triangle of the week:

Felix: I wish I were friends with Zara because she's friends with Sofia.

Lucie: Do you want to invite Zara to the Halloween party?

Felix: No. We're not friends. She's always scooding.

Lucie: Scooding? What's that?

Felix: You don't know what scooding is?

Lucie: No!

Felix: It's when you say, "Boys can't play that game."

Lucie: Do you mean "excluding"?

Felix: Yes, scooding. It's mean. It's not allowed at New School but some kids do it anyway.

Poor Lucie was at a yoga retreat Friday through Sunday. Simply forced to go, I tell you. Nana came to help a very relieved Dean with the kids.
title: October 22
